CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.autoFadeSheet.no: Whether to automatically fade out the sheet when it is not hovered over.
Press CTRL to keep the faded view while moving onto the sheet, and press CTRL to keep the full view while moving off the sheet.
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.autoMinimiseShee: Whether to automatically minimise the sheet when it is not hovered over.
Press CTRL to keep the minimized view while moving onto the sheet, and press CTRL to keep the maximized view while moving off the sheet.
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.bannerImage.note: Select an image to use as the banner on the character sheet. Recommended image size is 800 by 170. Leave blank to use the default
Recommended image size is 800 by 170. Leave blank to use the default.
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.showDeathSaves.n: Whether to show death saves tracking on the character sheet.
Whether to show encumbrance on the character sheet.
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.showExhaustion.n: Whether to show exhaustion tracking on the character sheet.
Whether to show the Inspiration button on the character sheet.
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.showManageCurren: Whether to show the Manage Currency button on the character sheet.
